medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset of right lower quadrant pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 days prior with lower quadrant discomfort, worsening significantly at night, waking the patient from sleep. Pain intensity increased, with the patient also endorsing anorexia and right-sided flank pain.
medical_history.family_history: No history of Crohn's disease or ulcerative colitis; grandfather with various cancers including possible leukemia, otherwise no history of malignancy.
medical_history.social_history: Travels within the area for work and pleasure.
